AddBookWindow - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui
AddBookWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants to add new books.
This class is created and executed when "Add" option is clicked under Books Menu in MainWindow class.
When executed, it displays a pop up window that provide TextFields to write the book's details: "Title, Author, Publishing Date and Publisher".
AddBookWindow(MainWindow) - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui.AddBookWindow
Constructs AddBookWindow for referencing/connecting to the main window.
addLoanToHistory(Loan) - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model.Patron
Adds a loan object the loanHistory array.

AddPatron - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands
Adds a new patron to the library.
AddPatron(String, String, String) - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.AddPatron
Initialises an AddPatron object using the necessary fields.
AddPatronWindow - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui
AddPatronWindow class extends JFrame that's responsible for creating a pop up window when the user wants to add new patrons.
It's created and used when "Add" option is clicked under Patrons Menu in MainWindow class.
It displays a form to type in Patron details: (Name, Phone Number, Email).
AddPatronWindow(MainWindow) - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui.AddPatronWindow
Constructs AddPatronWindow for referencing/connecting to the main window.
